title: Number Systems and the Foundations of Analysis
text:
Preface
The aim of this book is to study the basic number system of mathematics using as a principal guide Mendelson (2015) and other supplementary materials.
The idea is to develop all the topics and solve the exercises proposed in Mendelson (2015) as it is proposed in Mathematical Adventures




Mendelson, Elliott. 2015. Introduction to Mathematical Logic. Sixth edition. Textbooks in Mathematics. Boca Raton: CRC Press/Taylor & Francis Group.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Mendelson (2015) for additional discussion of literate programming.
